name: Fira
long_description:
Fira is a financial research assistant that helps investment analysts spend less time on company research. It instantly searches and analyzes thousands of pages of unstructured company filings and earnings reports to provide source-cited answers and verifiable financial calculations.

Our mission is to create a financial AI co-worker deeply integrated into both internal and external data source. It will help with research and analysis, generating investment documents, and workflow automation. This will eventually allow investment professionals to spend less time on manual tasks and focus more on building relationships and making decisions.
one_liner: Agentic AI platform for investment firms
